definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: sheath (Targum [[נְדָן]], [[לְדָן]]; v. BH (late) [[נׇדָן]], Pers. loan-word);—´[[בְּנ]]…:: Da 7:15 my spirit in (its) sheath, i.e. my body; < [[נִדְנׇה]] emph., or sf. [[נִדְנַהּ]] (K:§ 54, 3. b)); or (Nö:GGA. 1884, 1022 Bev) [[נְדָנַהּ]]; but expression at best strange; rd. prob. [[בְּגִין דְּנׇה]] on account of this ([[בְּגִין]] as Targum:J; D:§ 47.3 (2nd ed. 47.10)), M:72* cf. Buhl Dr.
